title: More logical disk sorting expected when there is a border value for row value
OB:
When sorting on disk with 40000 rows of data and setting the program to process less than 40000 rows, the program performs the following operations:
1.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, please follow these steps:
1. Enable disk sorting
2. Prepare a dataset with 40000 rows
3. Configure the program to process less than 40000 rows
4. Save the dataset as a temporary file
5. Load the temporary file into memory
6. Perform sorting on the data
7. Save the sorted data to a temporary file
